info.description: API contains operations on Aladdin User Group resource. Note: This is not intended to be used for Authorization.
info.title: Aladdin User Group

post.description: Prerequisite: You must have permission to create a User Group. You must have the Aladdin Permission PERMS_GROUP_CREATE or MOD_PERMS.

delete.description:
Prerequisite: You must have permission to delete a User Group. You must have the Aladdin Permission PERMS_GROUP_DELETE or MOD_PERMS.
The User Group should not have active users and/or active children.

parameters.description: A unique identifier for this request.
parameters.name: VND.com.blackrock.Request-ID

parameters.description: Timestamp assigned to this request at origin, in "HTTP-date" format as defined by RFC 7231.

parameters.description: The User Group to be deleted.
parameters.name: id

patch.description:
Prerequisite: You must have permission to update a User Group. You must have the Aladdin Permission PERMS_GROUP_CREATE or MOD_PERMS.
Fields that can be updated: group_description, auth_user_group, parent_user_group_id

parameters.description: A unique identifier for this request.
parameters.name: VND.com.blackrock.Request-ID

parameters.description: Timestamp assigned to this request at origin, in "HTTP-date" format as defined by RFC 7231.
parameters.name: VND.com.blackrock.Origin-Timestamp

parameters.description: The name of the User Group.
parameters.name: userGroup.id

parameters.description: The User Group to be updated.
parameters.name: body

post.description: Returns a list of User Groups for a user or permission. Returns all User Groups if a user or permission is not specified.

Any.description:
`Any` contains an arbitrary serialized message along with a
URL that describes the type of the serialized message

@type.description: A URL/resource name that uniquely identifies the type of the serialized message.

pageSize.description:
The maximum number of records to return. The service may
return fewer than this value. If unspecified, at most 1000
records will be returned. The maximum value is 1000; values
above 1000 will be coerced to 1000.

pageToken.description:
A page token, received from a previous 'FilterUserGroup' call.
Provide this to retrieve the subsequent page.

When paginating, all other parameters provided to
'FilterUserGroup' must match the call that provided the page
token.

userGroups.description: The User Groups to be returned.

nextPageToken.description:
A token, which can be sent as 'page_token' to retrieve the next page.
If this field is omitted, there are no subsequent pages.

v1MembershipType.description:
Enumeration of possible Membership Types.

 - MEMBERSHIP_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Returns all the User Groups for the user.
 - MEMBERSHIP_TYPE_DIRECT: Returns only the User Groups where the user is a direct member.
 - MEMBERSHIP_TYPE_INDIRECT: Returns only the User Groups where the user is not a direct member.

v1NodeType.description:
- NODE_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Reserved Value.
 - NODE_TYPE_USER_GROUP: A User Group (G) - can only contain users.
 - NODE_TYPE_INTERNAL: An Internal User Group (I) - can contain both Internal User Groups and leaf User Groups (G). Cannot contain users.
 - NODE_TYPE_ROOT: A Root User Group (R) - can only contain Internal User Groups. It is the uppermost node.
 - NODE_TYPE_OTHER: An Other User Group (O) - ignores all rules. To support old permissions hierarchy, hierarchy rules do not apply to this node type.
v1NodeType.title: Enumeration of possible Node Types

v1UserGroup.description: UserGroup describes User Group resource in Aladdin.

id.description: The name of the User Group.

groupDescription.description: The description of the User Group.

rootGroupId.description: The Root User Group - for User Groups of Node Type G, a Root User Group must be supplied.

authUserGroup.description:
The Authorization User Group.

Authorization is the process of giving someone permission to do or have something. These auth groups contain a list of users who can approve changes.
Must respect the enforced naming policy based on the environment.

parentUserGroupId.description: The Parent User Group - for User Groups of Node Type G, a Parent User Group must be supplied.

v1UserGroupQuery.description: Represents query to filter User Groups for users and permissions.

userId.description: User ID to retrieve all the User Groups the user is in.

permissionId.description: Permission ID to retrieve all the User Groups the permission is applied to.

membershipType.description:
This field represents the Membership Type.
Can only be used in combination with the user_id field to return User Groups based on the Membership Type to the user.

OAuth2AccessCode.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the access code flow.

scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.

OAuth2ClientCredentials.description: This API uses OAuth 2.0 with the client credentials flow.

scopes.offline_access: This keeps you signed in to the app, even when you are not using it.
